alert.note: Alert for Kauai East; Kauai Mountains; Kauai North; Kauai South; Kauai Southwest (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 22 at 3:04PM HST until March 23 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...FRONT WILL STALL OVER KAUAI AND BRING WIDESPREAD HEAVY RAIN THROUGH TONIGHT... ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Kauai. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Flood prone roads and other low lying areas may be closed due to elevated runoff and overflowing streams. Urban areas may receive more significant flooding and property damage due to rapid runoff. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - A front and upper trough will stall over Kauai tonight while trade winds push showers over much of the same windward and mountain areas and along the north shore. Wainiha and Hanalei Rivers, and Hanakapiai Stream will be the highest risk of flash flooding.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Kauai East; Kauai Mountains; Kauai North; Kauai South; Kauai Southwest
